```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#Matching listings zip code to tract
listings <- read.csv("Addresses_Sheet3.csv")
```

```{r}
listings <- listings %>%
  rename(ZIP = `ZIP Code`) %>%  
  mutate(ZIP = sprintf("%05s", ZIP))  # pad with leading zeros
```

```{r}
listings_per_zip <- listings %>%
  group_by(ZIP) %>%
  summarise(listing_count = n()) %>%
  ungroup()
```

```{r}
write.csv (listings_per_zip, "listings_per_ZIP.csv")
```
